item.title: Trump signals backing for Florida marijuana legalisation
item.description: The US presidential hopeful appeared to signal his support, placing him at odds with other Republicans.

item.title: Russians Bomb Kharkiv, Ukraine Says, After Russia Reports Wave of Attacks
item.description: Ukraine said Russia struck the country’s second-largest city with missiles and bombs. Russian state media and local officials earlier reported that Ukraine attacked power plants and refineries with drones.

item.title: Ukrainian drone attacks hit power stations and refineries in Russia
item.description:
Russia plays down overnight strikes as its forces make incremental gains in Donbas and launch missiles at Kharkiv

Ukraine has carried out one of its biggest ever drone attacks on Russia, with videos showing a series of explosions and fires at power stations and refineries including in Moscow.

Russia’s defence ministry downplayed the overnight strikes. It said it had intercepted and destroyed 158 unmanned enemy aerial vehicles. These were shot down over 15 regions, it claimed.

Continue reading...

item.title: Middle East crisis live: calls for general strike in Israel as pressure grows on government to agree hostage deal
item.description:
Head of Histadrut union urges all civilian workers to join action amid outrage over death of six hostages

item.title: Israel's largest trade union calls general strike for Monday as protests swell after hostage deaths
With men at the front lines, women watch over Ukraine's night sky for Russian drones
A Palestinian TikTok star who shared details of Gaza life under siege is killed by Israeli airstrike
